title: 5.3 Master Challenge 2
question:
Write a Java program that solves quadratic equations of the form ax2 + bx + c= 0
Utilize the Math.sqrt() and Math.pow() methods from the Java Math class to calculate the discriminant and the roots of the equation. Your program should prompt the user to enter the coefficients a, b and c and then display the roots. Be sure to consider special cases such as when the equation has one real root or when the equation has no real roots. Display appropriate messages for these special cases.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
